originalText.text: I couldn't be happier in the way Dr. Sharon Herzfeld took care of my daughter. Dr. Herzfeld came very highly recommended. After stumping many other well respected doctors, she was able to ask the right questions and take the appropriate tests to develop a customized treatment plan that was perfectly suited for my daughter, who did extremely well under her care. I can not recommend her enough. Dr. Herzfeld is the quintessential professional, as well as being kind, considerate and brilliant!!!

text.text: I couldn't be happier in the way Dr. Sharon Herzfeld took care of my daughter. Dr. Herzfeld came very highly recommended. After stumping many other well respected doctors, she was able to ask the right questions and take the appropriate tests to develop a customized treatment plan that was perfectly suited for my daughter, who did extremely well under her care. I can not recommend her enough. Dr. Herzfeld is the quintessential professional, as well as being kind, considerate and brilliant!!!

originalText.text: Dr Herzfeld is the kindest, most caring, intelligent doctor my daughter has ever seen. She will create a plan specifically for your child. My daughter has been her patient for more than six years. Every year has been successful. I consider the day we met her one of the most important days of my daughters life. Thank you Dr Herzfeld!
